description: This file implements a deterministic 7-bag generator for Tetromino sequences in Tetris, allowing for reproducible randomness based on a seed. It manages a bag of Tetromino types, shuffling and refilling it as needed.

classes.name: SevenBagRNG
classes.description: A class that provides a reproducible, seedable generator for Tetromino sequences using the 7-bag method.

methods.name: next
methods.description: Returns the next TetrominoType from the current bag, refilling if necessary.

methods.name: reseed
methods.description: Reinitializes the generator with a new seed and clears the current bag.

methods.name: refill
methods.description: Refills and shuffles the bag with a new set of TetrominoTypes.
